definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: All eastbound trains have been cancelled due to faulty signals.
sentences.chinese: 所有向東開去的火車由於信號錯誤而均被取消。

sentences.english: CATV signals travel strightyly high up into the space from TV stations.
sentences.chinese: 有線電視信號從電視臺直接送入空間。

sentences.english: Simulations have been made to validate the good separation performance of the algor…
sentences.chinese: 仿真驗證對聲音等非平穩信號具有良好的分離效果。

sentences.english: One key problem when analyzing actual acoustic signal in phase space is how to reduce the noise and lower the embedding dimension.
sentences.chinese: 實際水聲信號在相空間中分析時的首要問題是降噪。

sentences.english: Small-signal diodes are manufactured with varying response times to changes in voltage.
sentences.chinese: 小信號二極管的電壓變化響應時間可長可短。

sentences.english: A material handler in the downstream location is signaled to withdraw parts.
sentences.chinese: 位於下游的物料管理員收到領取零部件的信號。

sentences.english: Signals in the spectrum can penetrate walls, making it ideal for wireless broadband.
sentences.chinese: 該頻段的信號可以穿透牆壁，從而非常適合無線寬帶。

sentences.english: HF radar backscatter from the ocean surface shows nonlinearities and time variation of its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 高頻波段海洋回波信號表現了非線性和頻譜時變性。

sentences.english: P9 had a coiled-coil region; all five proteins have no signal peptides.
sentences.chinese: P9蛋白有一個螺旋捲曲區域，五個蛋白均無信號肽。

sentences.english: Based on the theory of time series analysis, differential pressure fluctuation signals of gas-liquid two - phase flow are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 用時間序列方法分析氣液兩相流差壓波動信號。

sentences.english: Video recording or reproducing apparatus, whether or not incorporating a video tuner.
sentences.chinese: 視頻信號錄製或重放設備，不論是否裝有高頻調諧器。

sentences.english: The optimization of signal timing is an important way to improve intersection level of service.
sentences.chinese: 信號配時優化是提高平面交叉口服務水平的重要途徑。

sentences.english: This table can also be made to send non-return of the source of signal transmission path .
sentences.chinese: 此表也有作向發送者返回非傳遞信號的源路徑。

sentences.english: An international radiotelephone signal word used by aircraft and ships in distress.
sentences.chinese: 遇險後，船員立刻發出求救信號。

sentences.english: The signals create images of your heart that can help your doctor determine the cause of your heart arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 通過檢測信號就可以對心臟成像並幫助醫生推測病因。

sentences.english: The most widely used single-axis inductive pickoff is the microsyn.
sentences.chinese: 最廣泛應用的單軸感應式信號傳感器是微動同步器。

definition: to move along one's course (of celestial bodies etc)/(fig.) to function/to be in operation/(of a train service etc) to operate/to run/(of a computer) to run
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to issue (an order, decree etc)/to send out/to dispatch/to produce (a sound)/to let out (a laugh)
